title: Azir Rework
body: Well, I know that azir was announced as a mini rework but is there a timetable for this? I mean on the champ update schedule he isn't listed and xin zhao is listed as the last one. It was also said that xin zhao was maybe 1.5 years out... So does that mean azir is getting reworekd 2 years out? Or is he not listed because he's a mini rework?

replies.body: We're still pretty early on in the process of reworking Azir AFAIK, but Wav3Break went into a little more detail on his post [**over here**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/HsZurxEO-azir-gameplay-update-goals-and-directions). He goes pretty in depth on some of the key aspects they're working on improving or changing, but it doesn't look like there's any hard date on it yet.
Is there going to be a Dr.Mundo rework ?
every Rework will come out after the world's and a schedule is: Xin , Azir , LeBLanc , but no specific dates
